name: code-consolidation
description: Rohan code consolidation Phase 1: 4 independent refactoring tasks

members.name: worker-keywords
members.prompt:
You are a teammate on team "code-consolidation". Your name is "worker-keywords".

Read task #2 from the task list, then implement the changes.

Your job: Extract 7 logic keyword I/O functions from main.py into a new module.

Key steps:
1. Read /Users/masaaki/Desktop/prm/rohan/backend/main.py to find these functions (around L245-435):
   - normalize_code_column
   - validate_logic_sheet_structure  
   - load_logic_keywords
   - get_sheet_names
   - validate_logic_sheet
   - clean_oversized_text_fields (including _cleaned_log_keys and _CLEANED_LOG_MAX_SIZE module vars)
   - load_logic_keywords_async

2. Create new file: /Users/masaaki/Desktop/prm/rohan/backend/utils/logic_keywords.py
   - Move all 7 functions there (exact same code, no logic changes)
   - Add required imports (pandas, Path, logging, openpyxl, etc.)
   - The functions reference data_paths - check how they access it and maintain the same pattern

3. Update main.py:
   - Replace the 7 function definitions with imports from utils.logic_keywords
   - Keep all callers working

4. Verify no other files import these functions directly from main

CRITICAL RULES:
- Do NOT change any function logic - pure extraction
- Do NOT make changes outside the scope
- Preserve all existing function signatures
- Mark task #2 as completed when done
